description: Level 1b data set produced for the investigations of the scalar residuals between the readings of the scalar magnetometer (ASM) and the vector magnetometer (VFM)
variables_table:
Variable,Units,Description,Dim,Type
t,-,Time of observation,1,CDF_EPOCH
r,m,Position in ITRF ... Radius,1,CDF_DOUBLE
theta,deg,Position in ITRF ... co-latitude,1,CDF_DOUBLE
phi,deg,Position in ITRF ... Longitude,1,CDF_DOUBLE
B,nT,"Magnetic field vector, VFM frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
F,nT,Magnetic field intensity,1,CDF_DOUBLE
q,-,"Quaternion, transformation: NEC ... CRF",4,CDF_DOUBLE
Eclipse,-,Satellite in Earth's eclipse,1,CDF_UINT1
alpha,deg,"Sun inclination angle, azimuth",1,CDF_DOUBLE
beta,deg,"Sun inclination angle, elevation",1,CDF_DOUBLE
